guide.guideDescription: Islands are identified with both names and coordinates. When viewing the map screen, imagine the letters A-E along the top edge (identifying the columns) and the numbers 1-7 along the left edge (identifying the rows). For example, Outset Island is [B7] (column B, row 7). Great Sea map squares (which you get from the Fishmen) is not covered in this guide. All Treasure Maps will be shown in the guide, but only the Piece of Heart rewards are directly included in the guide (you can get the Rupee chests whenever you need them and come across them, and the special charts are pointless since you're following this guide).

gameSegment.heading: Nayru's Pearl and lots of Great Sea goodies

entry.description: The whole Great Sea is now opened to you, and there is a LOT of stuff you can get. This guide will follow the story just a bit more until you get the Bombs, which allows you to get the two wallet upgrades, which are very helpful in the rest of this section.

Don't forget to stock up on All-Purpose Bait and unlock the Great Sea Map as you travel.
